data.title: Electro Dance Music
data.meta_description:
Spark7 - Vanquish (Sonic Element Remix)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T-znaEDBs_s

I love this song! It's trance but with a twist in an electro bassline...
data.text:
Spencer & Hill - Cool (Afrojack Remix)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9yb_sOoKGpc

Afrojack - Zeggie

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MziUzn-dePk

Proxy - Raven (Crookers remix)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ir2txzWIuuk

Spark7 - Northern Lights (Original mix)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O3EP-d2GQdk&NR=1

Vinyl Shakerz - One Night in Bangkok

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6f30PxyNfSA

Basement Jaxx - Set Your Body Free (Crookers remix)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qh2zCuB75A0

Mobin Master feat. Karina Chavez - Don't Stop Movin' (Marcello K remix)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pbx2VzMGfdQ

Silvio Ecomo & Chuckie - Moombah (Afrojack remix)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3N1OQvJ5v2k

Sir James - You're Special

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GWG49SMtMgw

Yeah I have a lot of music to post haha, the last one has to be one of my favourites ever but I like all these tracks a fair bit so give them a listen :)!

man the Crookers Remix of Raven is out of this world... i heard it a year ago and whenever I DJ a party I make sure to always play it because it never fails to make errbody go buckwild! Even my puppies react when I play it loud! hahahahah

Glad you like the music Setsuna! If you're a fan of trance, I'm actually working on a remix for a competition at the moment using FL studio. Pain in the ass but I'll show you when done :).

As for your link, I thought it had already been posted in the thread? If not, I must have assumed it was posted already because for the last year or so, Adagio has been my favourite trance song of all time - and that is saying a lot!

I am indeed a fan of trance, so yeah don't hesitate to show me that remix once you're done with it :P

As for that song of Tiesto, yeah I thought it had already been posted here as well, but I did a quick search and it didn't appear in any of the pages. So I knew at the moment that such a great song shouldn't be missing this thread, haha. Adagio for Strings is just, how to say... supreme.

This is something else I just discovered when listening to a compilation of Dance and Trance music -- a very good song IMO, the beat is awesome: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZaflNU45bVY

ive actually never been a fan of adagio... the orchestral version is really awesome and this adaptation has always seemed kinda lame to me, a rare misstep by tiesto.

but i am not here to complain i am here to share good music!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NA9ebFeQmm0

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=umE0IFs_dro

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HzAaBGXbGeA

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pSXRKG0Zyic

I have so much more if you guys like it!!!!!

(keep in mind that with long dance tracks, since they are unmixed, you have to be patient before judging because it sometimes takes time to get to the fucking awesome parts! this is necessary when dancing but otherwise a little tedious, but it's only fair to the music :P it is dance music after all!)

Really enjoyed that Trance song Stallion ^_^

So recently I found a DJ called "Manian", which is the DJ of an amazing Trance band (Tune Up), and has a lot of cool music such as Welcome to the Club. Now I've discovered more good songs of him, and I would like to put them here ^

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YtyYcn0iApw --> DJ Manian: Ravers in the UK *****

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y6OkujW0Kz4&feature=related --> DJ Manian: Sky ****

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mDxpeLaoYv4&feature=related --> DJ Manian: Hold me Tonight ****

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0RrtY2lpf40 --> Tune Up: Ravers Fantasy (this was one of the more cataloged songs of 2009)

By the way Stallion, I bet you'll like the last one :P

Haha Setsuna you know me too well, I did indeed enjoy the last song and am checking out the others. It's not quite hardstyles but it's harder then regular electro. I'm much more picky with this music as it's pretty easy to screw up, but i'll check out the other songs posted!! Oh and now that Setsuna has posted, I have another trance track from TyDi called Vanilla :). It was played on Armin's ASOT which is pretty prestigious!

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3tF8HQfY1JA

EDIT: I'm not as big a fan of "Sky", but Ravers in the UK is very very catchy :). Hold Me Tonight isn't too bad either!

As a lover of electro, I lurk this thread, and I haven't got anything to share atm (I do have a lot of happy hardcore and trance on my iPhone, but... shy about sharing music =P), and I just wanted to say I adore what BigPDA just posted: Alexander Wolff - Destructive (Mark Norman Remix). It does take awhile to climax, but that's what you should be expecting from long dance tracks, and it's very good all the way through. Thank you for sharing! Oh, and MS, very nice work from TyDi (You Walk Away, haven't checked out the other one yet). I love vocal trance, and it hits just the right pulsing beep noises that I crave. Ethereal, just like trance should be! The shift around the 1-minute mark is very enthralling, love how it builds up...

ETA: Sweet, Audrey Gallagher! And seems this song was featured on an Armin van Buuren CD. Awesome =)

I've been leeching off this thread for too long without giving anything back.

No more!

Some people may have heard me talk about it on IRC, but I am a large fan of breakbeat especially. Here are some of my personal favourites

enjoy the following polyrhythms and syncopation;

Supertweeker - Killer

Supertweeker - Let's Go (sorry this is not a youtube link)

Far Too Loud - Screamer

Far Too Loud - Midnight

The Crystal Method - Double Down Under - This is my #1

Meat Katie - Dirty South
